Class MovieList

  • java.lang.Object
    • term.project.cis350.MovieList

  • public class MovieList
extends java.lang.Object
    Aids in communication between controller and GUI.
    Author:
    Chris

    • Method Detail

      • getMoviePoster

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getMoviePoster(int desHeight,
                                            int desWidth)
        Returns an ImageIcon that corresponds to the curMovie and scaled to the desired Height and width based on the input parameters desHeight and desWidth respectively.
        Parameters:
        desHeight - defines the desired height for the returned imageIcon
        desWidth - defines the desired width for the returned imageIcon
        Returns:
        ImageIcon with the desired width and height of the current Movie on FOCUS
        See Also:
        ImageIcon

      • getMovieToWatch

        public javax.swing.ImageIcon getMovieToWatch(int desHeight,
                                             int desWidth)
        Returns an ImageIcon that corresponds to the current movie suggestion and scaled to the desired Height and width based on the input parameters desHeight and desWidth respectively.
        Parameters:
        desHeight - defines the desired height for the returned imageIcon
        desWidth - defines the desired width for the returned imageIcon
        Returns:
        ImageIcon with the desired width and height of the current Movie suggested
        See Also:
        ImageIcon

      • getPosterAndSetCurMovie

        private javax.swing.ImageIcon getPosterAndSetCurMovie(int desHeight,
                                                      int desWidth,
                                                      boolean isWatchSug)
        movie getPosterAndSetCurMovie returns a ImageIcon that is scaled based to the desired input parameters. Additionally, it keeps track if the call was based on a get movie suggestion or just another movie to be rated.
        Parameters:
        desHeight - is the desired height in which the poster should be scaled to
        desWidth - is the desired width in which the poster should be scaled to
        isWatchSug - is a bool that determines if the poster selection was the result of a getMovie selections.
        Returns:
        ImageIcon with desired width and height

      • setMovieScore

        public void setMovieScore(int numStars)
        setMovieScore is used to rate the curMovie object. For invalid inputs i.e. < minStars or > maxStars this function does nothing
        Parameters:
        numStars - is used to set the curMovie rating for that movie.

      • genreList

        public java.lang.String[] genreList()
        This function is used to return a list of all the available movie genres. additionally it includes adding an all genres string that will always be at the top of the list.
        Returns:
        String[] returns a list of valid genres for this application

      • setGenre

        public java.lang.Boolean setGenre(java.lang.String sentGenre)
        setGenre is used to set the current Genre to get results from. This function returns Boolean true if the genre was set or set to a different genre than its previous state. if the genre remains the same the function returns false.
        Parameters:
        sentGenre - String that is used to set the current genre of interest.
        Returns:
        Boolean returns true if genre was changed false otherwise.

      • genreListAvail

        public java.lang.String[] genreListAvail()
        returns the list of available genres made in the search class.
        Returns:
        search.getGenreAvail the list of available genres.

      • getSelectGenre

        public java.lang.String getSelectGenre()
        gets the comboBox Selected String desired.
        Returns:
        returns selected String from the Available Genres

      • eraList

        public java.lang.String[] eraList()
        eraList() returns a list of valid era strings that can be used to select an era to get movie suggestions or movies to rate.
        Returns:
        String[] is a list of valid era strings for the application.

      • getSelectedEra

        public java.lang.String getSelectedEra()
        gets the comboBox Selected Index desired.
        Returns:
        returns selected string

      • setEra

        public java.lang.Boolean setEra(java.lang.String sentEra)
        setEra() is used to set the current search mode by an era's criteria. the function returns true if the era was change to a different era or false if nothing was changed
        Parameters:
        sentEra - is a string that is used to change the current era search criteria.
        Returns:
        returns true if the era was changed false otherwise.

      • ratingList

        public java.lang.String[] ratingList()
        ratingList() returns a string[] that contains valid rating options for this application search results.
        Returns:
        String[] contains a list of valid rating options for this applications search results.

      • getSelectedRating

        public java.lang.String getSelectedRating()
        used to get the current rating selection.
        Returns:
        returns a string associated with the current rating selected

      • setRating

        public java.lang.Boolean setRating(java.lang.String sentRating)
        setRating() returns true if the input string caused a change in the current movie rating search criteria. or false otherwise. This function is used to set the search criteria for getting a curMovie object.
        Parameters:
        sentRating - is a string to set the search criteria
        Returns:
        Boolean returns true if the rating criteria was changed, false otherwise.

      • getMaxStars

        public int getMaxStars()
        getMaxStar() returns the maximum valid star rating for this application.
        Returns:
        int returns the maximum valid star rating for this application.

        public int getMinStars()
        getMinStars() returns the minimum valid star rating for this application.
